attributes.action: Make rioters work weekends for their community to repair it in an 'I rioted' hoodie
attributes.additional_details: Cutting benefits, jailing young people is not the answer.  Making rioters repair the damage they caused and learning the disdain ordinary people have for their actions will teach them a useful lesson and help the rebuilding effort.  Working weekends for their community in a 'I rioted' hoodie would achieve this.
